articles.title: Regional manufacturing of vaccines to bolster pandemic preparedness in the Americas - World - ReliefWeb
articles.description: News and Press Release in English on World about Health and Epidemic; published on 13 Jul 2022 by PAHO
articles.content: Washington D.C. 13 July 2022 (PAHO) – As Omicron sub-lineages BA.4 and BA.5 drive a new wave of COVID-19 infections across the Americas, and cases of monkeypox continue to rise, the Pan American Heal… [+3272 chars]
